mapper.sql: from t_order o left join t_customer u on o.customerId=u.id
mapper.update:
update t_order
status=#{status},
where id in
#{id}
update set t_sku set quantity = (quantity-#{quantity}) where id = #{skuId}

update t_order
payTime=#{payTime}, status=#{status},
logisticsNo=#{logisticsNo},
where id = #{id}

update t_sku a inner join ( select t1.skuId,sum(quantity) as quantity from t_order_sku t1 inner join t_order t2 on t1.orderId = t2.id where t2.status = 0 and t2.createTime < date_sub(now(),interval 1 day) group by t1.skuId ) b on a.id = b.skuId set a.quantity = a.quantity + b.quantity
update t_order set status = 6 where createTime < date_sub(now(),interval 1 day) and status = 0
mapper.select: select a . *, b.username,b.showname, c.address,c.consignee,c.phone from t_order a left join t_customer b ON a.customerId = b.id left join t_address c ON a.addressId = c.id limit #{start},#{rows}

select t1.name skuName,t1.originalPrice,t1.discountPrice,t1.standard,t2.quantity buy_quantity,t2.unitPrice,t3.freight,t4.mainImgUuid from t_sku t1 left join t_order_sku t2 ON t1.id = t2.skuId left join t_order t3 on t2.orderId = t3.id left join t_product t4 on t1.productId = t4.id where t3.customerId = #{customerId} group by t3.id
limit #{start},#{rows}

select t1.name skuName,t1.originalPrice,t1.discountPrice,t1.standard,t2.quantity buy_quantity,t2.unitPrice,t3.freight,t4.mainImgUuid from t_sku t1 left join t_order_sku t2 ON t1.id = t2.skuId left join t_order t3 on t2.orderId = t3.id left join t_product t4 on t1.productId = t4.id where t3.id = #{orderId}
limit #{start},#{rows}
